reviews.review_msg: Nice guy but he mumbles during lectures and is really hard to understand.

He tries his best but this class gave me so much anxiety. I had to constantly chase him for criteria and feedback. I learned more about the concepts through readings than his lecture. Gave unrealistic criteria for short assignments (he wants a miracle paper but not to read it) & ALWAYS last minute after we had to remind him.

absolutely DRY and are some of the most boring one can attend. On top of absolutely dry lectures, Brian's grading criteria is amongst the most confusing anyone has ever seen-- he doesn't even let you know the basis you're grades on and where marks would apply. I would steer clear of him
